a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The Human Capital Index (HCI) combines indicators of health and education into a measure of the human
capital that a child born today can expect to obtain by their 18th birthday, on a scale from 0 to 1. Higher values
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
